overview: Jimmy is CEO of Nexonova, a game development studio of Nexon Corp that specializes in Social Network Games. Prior to Nexonova, Jimmy served Executive Vice President of Nexon Corp, and Head of Nexonâ€™s Portal (www.nexon.com) and Web Services. Nexon is one of the most successful online gaming provider, with games such as Maple Story, Dungeon and Fighter, Combat Arms, and Kart Rider. Nexon services over 20 games across 60 countries to an audience of 300 million. Jimmy is also the CEO of Innotive, where Nexon is a shareholder. Innotive mixes passion, creativity and technology to create new interactive user experiences and innovative presentation solutions. Innotiveâ€™s client lists include BMW. Infiniti, Hyundai/Kia Motors, Hyundai Steel, POSCO, Korea Telecom and other leading worldwide companies. Jimmy received his B.S. in Engineering from Northwestern University, and also a M.S. in Engineering from Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST). Jimmy also completed the Stanford Universityâ€™s Graduate School of Businessâ€™s Executive Management Program.
